OOC: I want to thank my cousin for playing you have alot of heart Ryo. He 
was strong enough to take Oblitericons arm off. Since I created Koj and 
Inu-Yasha as a experiment moves there skills are all being field test. And 
since this is my cousins first Rpg I think he has done a excellent job. He's 
shown more courage and guts then I seen since I played this Rpg. Since he 
left me to cover for him I'll play Koj and Inu plus some shadows from the 
past. Lets see how you fare in a fair fight with Koj and Inu Ks but since 
you always use size or numbers that will be the day. Also since there are 
over 100 attacks on the 2 this is the short version.

::Koj::
Koj looks at all the attack Fire "Neo Scramble." Koj takes of countering and 
avoiding what he can absorbs the lighting in to the Lance.

::Neo Bahamut::
Doing the same

::As the Fire smoke as and etc settle in.::

::Koj::
"Neo ya dead yet?" As Koj looking for lack of a better word like shit bullet 
holes ever were his radar ear piece broken his mask cracked and chiped. 
Leaking enegry and has dart in his shoulder. Koj taps a becon.

::Neo::
"No mon" As his wings are tattered his armor marred, dinged, burned, cracked 
and piece by hanging on. Laughing calls out "Maybe we should fall back.

::Both::
"NAAAAAAAAAAAAA"

::As the smokeclears::

::Koj::
Koj walks out "Its not over yet I still can go one more round!" As koj I.A.S 
System starts to deal with the strain and damage. Looking around the 
Alliance leaving them for dead. Sink ratio 100%+ "Lets go home we'll meet 
them again soon enough." As climbs on Neo.

::Neo::
Neo thinks its moments like this I wonder about him "We can go one more 
round as he stands up." looking at his Sink Ratio 100%+ Neo takes off back 
towards the CF.

::Else where::

::?1::
Sitting is a place that reaks of Smoke fire and brimstone that becons a Old 
autobot channel "That signals unit Zero? Koj?" Jets maxium burn.

::?2::
"It can't be here on earth he would have never come here?1 you can't go you 
still need to train not." As she takes off after him followed by 4 more.
